summary: Comprehensive testing of XoW Expo Recording System - User reported issues (Saving, Uploading, Add Device) validated. Backend: 20/22 tests passed (91%). Frontend: All dashboard flows working correctly.

minor.issue: Returns 500 instead of 400/404 for invalid user_id - error handling could be improved
Returns 400 instead of 404 for deleted recording - minor error response difference

critical_code_review_comments: Dashboard login/signup flow working correctly - users can signup and get redirected to dashboard
Add Device flow WORKING: User enters 6-digit code -> Gets 8-digit OTP -> Verified via API tests
Mobile device registration API (/api/mobile/register-device) generates unique 6-digit codes
OTP verification flow (/api/mobile/verify-otp) correctly associates device with user
Recordings CRUD fully functional - create, read, list, complete, delete all working
Video and audio upload endpoints exist and accept files (422 when no file provided - correct)
Dashboard tabs all working: Overview (stats), Sessions (recordings list), Visitors, Devices
Sessions show AI summaries with 'Host Identified' badges when processed

test_credentials.note: Users created dynamically during tests with pattern test_*@example.com or uitest_*@example.com

seed_data_creation: No seed data needed - tests create and clean up their own data
